attributes.action: Freedom or fear? Allow people to opt out of the state control of Covid-19.
attributes.additional_details: I want the freedom of choice which has been taken away by the government.  I live in a democracy and the current action is un democratic and based on in-exact data.  I do not want to live in a totalitarian society where I am told what to do, like you must wear a face mask.
attributes.background: Allow people to sign a disclaimer to say they won’t blame any establishment, company or business if the contract Covid-19

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "opt out of state control". 

You may wish to sign this petition:

Don't make the wearing of face masks compulsory in public places in England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331174
